messages.message:
Now that the metronome migration is complete, I chatted with @andy and I'm going to reassign the billing Cypress tests from @Victor Zeng to product area owners who will be able to dig in more easily if a test starts failing:

• app-billing (doc translation app): @Aayush 
• converse-billing: @Aayush 
• build-billing: @danny.lan 
• payment: @Weiming Wu 
• @Weiming Wu we'll also want a test sometime soon for running apps, so that we don't run into another bug like the classification step one
PR is here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/64349
A number of these are either skipped in CI or skipping completely and pretty flakey, and we should do our best to get them up to snuff :pray:
Great. Can we also reassign the billing UATs as well? cc @Heymian
Yes I think we can reassign UAT’s too, but maybe for the next release (24.44) and on.
